page.title: 07PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: {These games are played in the school playground:- Tig Stuck-in-the-mud Race and Chase Chainy Hopscotch Leapfrog Netball Football Basketball Polo Cricket British Bulldog Sevens Orange Balls These are the rules for Polo. One person is on,that person chooses a category,the other players become a name of something in that category . That person is told the names,but not who is which.Then he now calls one of the names .The person of that name has to beat the person on,from the other end of the playground back to their place. When the people cross the line they have to shout polo, the fisrt to shout polo is on. BY RACHAEL W. {and AMY H.
